edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.analytics

Class DomainnameSimilarityCalculatorThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.analytics.SimilarityCalculatorThread
        • edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.analytics.DomainnameSimilarityCalculatorThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DomainnameSimilarityCalculatorThread
extends SimilarityCalculatorThread
    The implementation of the SimilarityCalculatorThread for calculating domainname based similarity.
    Author:
    Chris Neasbitt

    • Constructor Detail

      • DomainnameSimilarityCalculatorThread

        public DomainnameSimilarityCalculatorThread(DBInterface db,
                                    java.lang.String adatestr,
                                    java.lang.String bdatestr,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> aclusters,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> bclusters,
                                    java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReferenceArray<java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReferenceArray<java.lang.Double>> results)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Instantiates a new domainname similarity calculator thread.
        Parameters:
        db - the database interface
        adatestr - the date of the first clustering run
        bdatestr - the date of the second clustering run
        aclusters - the list of cluster id's from the first run for which to calculate similarities
        bclusters - the list of cluster id's from the second run to compare with the clusters in the first list
        results - the result buffer in which to place the calculated similarity
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the DomainnameSimilarityCalculatorThread.properties file can not be loaded
